com.jgefroh.core

Interface IInfoPack

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInfoPack

    public interface IInfoPack
    Interface for an InfoPack.

    An InfoPack is intended to provide a System access to data held in a component via accessor methods (getters/setters). They group together one or more related Components that contain data needed by a System.

    It is also intended to control whether a System will process an Entity through its presence or lack of presence.

    Core automatically calls the generate(entity) method to generate an InfoPack.

    Author:
    Joseph Gefroh
    See Also:
    Core, IComponent, ISystem
